about_the_game:
Introducing the highly anticipated Original Game Soundtrack of RollScape! This collection features all 50 (26 + 24) songs in "320kbps MP3's" format from the game. As more locations will be added in coming updates, so will this soundtrack be updated. Your support means the world to me and all income will go to creating new content for RollScape (and me staying alive during that process)! Hope you enjoy!

Includes
  • Every Location's Theme (24)
  • Victory Theme (1)
  • Main Menu Theme (1)

The Transcendence Update Added 24 New Songs!
  • Every New Location's Theme (10)
  • Every Transcendence Phase Theme (5)
  • Every Song from the Endless Theme (8)
  • A New, Full Version of the Cinematic Theme (1)

And many more to come!

name: RollScape Soundtrack
short_description: Introducing the highly anticipated Original Game Soundtrack of RollScape! This collection features all 50 songs from the game. Your support means the world to me, and I hope you enjoy every moment of the music!
